alert.note: Alert for Boyd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 10:46PM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of one to two inches and additional ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Ohio and northeast Kentucky. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
